p: The NF- κB transcription factor plays a key role in the expression of some cytokines and inflammatory enzymes, such as iNOS, COX-2, TNF- α, IL-1 β, and IL-6. To determine whether CS-LO affects NF-кB pathway, NF-кB p65, a major subunit of NF-кB, was assessed in the presence or absence of CS-LO using western blot. As shown in Figures 3(a) and 3(b), the expression of NF-кB p65 was increased significantly with absence of CS-LO in RAW 264.7 cells. However, the p65 ( Figure 3(a)) was inhibited in concentration-dependent manner in cells with CS-LO.
